item.title: The Right Way to Batch Send SMS to Contacts in Excel, Google Sheets, and Apple Numbers
item.description: Sending out bulk SMS to a list of contacts has been a widely used technique for businesses, event organizers, and various professionals. The ability to send a message en masse can save time and help keep contacts informed. While Excel, Google Sheets, and Apple Numbers are not inherently built to send SMS, extensions and third-party services have come to the rescue to make this possible. However, there are pitfalls to be aware of.
